about_the_game:
Do you like making music? If so DanielX.net Paint Composer is the perfect game to expand your creativity. The simple interface, versatile sounds, and fun characters will make all of your musical dreams come true. Compose songs effortlessly! Easily share your creations with the world by creating a link that anyone can follow to see and hear what you've come up with.

Export your music as: .mp3, .wav, .midi. You can even export .mp4 videos to upload to your favorite video hosting platforms! Import songs from .midi files, use custom SoundFonts, create custom video effects, even use your own sprites and characters. There is no limit to what you can create!

I hope you have as much fun playing with Paint Composer as I had making it.

- Daniel X Moore

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: DanielX.net Paint Composer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: x86, x64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews:
“The most accessible remake of the muisc mode to date”
9000 – Journal of Literature and Art Studies
short_description: Create beautiful music simply and easily! Save your compositions and share them with friends and the world. Interesting characters are fun for both kids and adults. The musical staff is welcoming, you can leverage your existing knowledge of music or expand it through experimentation. Enjoy!
